```{r include=FALSE}
require(knitr)
require(kableExtra)
require(dplyr)
```

```{r echo=FALSE, include=TRUE}
date_time <- c(
  "9:00–10:30 am",
  "10:30-10:40 am",
  "10:40-12:10 am",
  "12:10–1:00 pm",
  "1:00 – 2:30 p.m"
)

events <- c(
  "Welcome Address by SPM President Betsy Sinclair",
  "Round Table: Past, Present, and Future of Political Methodology\n
   Panelist: Kosuke Imai, Molly Roberts, Yiqing Xu, Betsy Sinclair",
  "Break",
  "Chad Hazlett and Yiqing Xu, Trajectory Balancing: A kernel based weighting approach to causal inference with time-series cross-sectional data",
  "Daniel J. Hopkins, Yphtach Lelkes, Samuel Wolken, Which News Goes Viral? Measuring Identity Threats and Engagement with News Media Posts on Twitter and Facebook",
  "Discussant: Xun Pang (Tsinghua University)"
)

schedule_tab <- tibble(
  Time = c(rep(date_time[1], 2), date_time[2], rep(date_time[3], 3)), 
  Time_fill = rep("", length(events)),
  Events = events
) 

schedule_tab %>% 
  select(Time_fill, Events) %>% 
  kable(col.names = NULL) %>% 
    kable_styling(full_width = FALSE, font_size = 20) %>% 
    column_spec(1, bold = T, border_right = TRUE) %>% 
    pack_rows(index = table(forcats::fct_inorder(schedule_tab$Time)))



```
